response.overview: FunSizeBoys is all about size-difference, where little guys take the huge cocks of king-sized tops, stretching their itty-bitty holes and making them whimper with pleasure. In this volume of FunSizeBoys, Carnal Media presents the adventures of tiny twink Marcus Rivers and his big-time love affairs with supersized DILFs Dr. Legrand Wolf, Dallas Steele, and Dolf Dietrich. Marcus might be on the small side, but he's always got big eyes for hulking hunks. At 5 '4" with an itsy bitsy 26" waistline, Marcus' feet can fit in one of Dr. Wolf's baseball mitt sized palms. And lucky for the colossal bodybuilders Mr. Dietrich and Mr. Steele, Marcus absolutely adores thick, hulking, macho men and silver foxes.
response.title: Marcus: Chapters 10 - 14
